Christians are not and will not be frenzied to convert by force again as early Europeans were through ignorance. The Quran is a different story however. It's audience has chosen to remain ignorant and be much more susceptible to the Charismatics who choose to manipulate for "personal agendas". I was dead and I am alive again, I was lost and I am found....I am free, more free than I have ever been that is why the soviets wanted to destroy us....beacuse Christians are people refuse to be oppressed and reject tyranny, because we will not chain ourselves to the floor and put a chain around our necks, because we were the one who they did not have control over.
 
 Christianity is not an opiet of the masses...oh how the soviets would have loved us to believe that, how they would have loved to be able to control us and manipulate us...pacify us......where is Karl Marx's beloved soviet union now?
 
 i am not dead, I will not suffer the politics of tony blair, bush or the unelected officials at the United Nations,opressive tyrants, politics that give me no choice, whoever i vote for its just the same ole b.s.... I will not chain myself to the floor, they may have fooled you, they even may have fooled many Christians but they will not fool those faithful to the Catholic Church....secular athiesim...... is communism!
 
 but even worse than that it is Intellectual communism and the state as supreeme is replaced with the doller as supreeme, your false god, your false hope, your false dreams, your false sense of security, your false pursuit of happiness...when you worship false gods you become as false and as dead as they are....your false marriage, your false family, your false notion of success...lost in a world of falsehood you become as empty as the promises of your false God makes to you all the while your so far out of it, your metal chains can be replaced with nice plasic chains and plastic collers that say "visa", you cry out we need our gun laws to protect ourselves, yet you do not realise the ones who you really need protecting from have bigger guns than you... put down the guns, you cant win with them anyway!

pacify...tell that to the soviet government!
 
 
 
 You talk about freedom as if at some point you have experienced it, you consider yourself a citizen of a free state, you yourself free, your lying to yourself....why do you obay the governments law (assuming you do) out of respect, love or fear...why do you pay your taxes, to pay for the poor or.... because you have to....be honest to yourself you have no clue what freedom is and yet your such an expert on freedom you have the authority and knowhow to be able to determin just what the "feeling of freedom" is akin to.
 
 Many years ago many living men wondered how a single man could be dead, today many dead men wonder how any man could be alive.

 The problem here is what the religious are doing to the people not associated with it.
 
 We don't really care how good it makes YOU feel which is what you seam most concerned with.
 
 Bible based religion promotes bigotry and encourages an unrealistic and egocentric view of reality.
 
 The last thing the world today needs is a bunch of people trained to believe in fairy tails.
 
 We need thinking people not mindless and misinformed cattle.
 
 If your life is so with out meaning or direction that you need religion to make it complete then I feel sorry for you, it must be very empty.

 What is wrong if it makes a person feel good ?
 
 No religion I've been involved in is either bigoted or unrealistic
 
 Religion to those who believe is not a fairy tale (not tail, quite something else), nor are the basic beliefs.
 
 Some of the greates thinkers in the world have also been religious
 
 Religion gives meaning to people who believe.

I am not trying to convince anyone.
 
 Over the years I have come to know that you going to be incredibly disappointed if you think you are going to convince anyone of anything except for yourself that is not worth it.
 
 Nothing is wrong with feeling good.
 
 I have used drugs in the past and have no great prejudiced against them.
 
 They will mess up your life sure as the sun will rise but for the most part I see the people that use the drugs as the problem.

Now Ms. White, take a deep breath and give this some thought. 
 Religion exist because people make it so. It is an inanimate thingy that could not walk to the fridge on it's own. It is a tool. And only a tool. A very powerful one that has been used to bring a lot of good to mankind and a lot of bad. But it will not function without man's will. Unless, I'm about to learn something here.
Religion is more of a crutch than a tool. A crutch to allow those with crippled minds to function at some sort of human level.

I think that may be a false analogy. Belief in god, perhaps in some ways, is like a drug, but ultimately it is not physically addicting. The massive amounts of endophins released by heroin cannot be matched by what is felt by spirtiual experience in humans. The reduced production in endoprhins following the heroin blast creates dependance on heroin which leads to quick addiction.
 
 I suppose, however, that the reward of spiritual immortality is far too great for some to simply discard their belief in the face of reason. Great conflicts such as war may be a good example. Somehow, some people living during atrocities manage to keep their faith, right?
